body_html:
Yeah but issue is that it is happening at .runInference call, on the second time when its called. I placed those log statements like this:

    Log.d("INFERNECE","before");
    inferenceInterface.runInference(outputNames);
    Log.d("INFERNECE","after");

and unfortunatelly there is not any further info regarding segfault, just

01-30 23:34:35.479 9490-9700/bazinac.aplikacenahouby I/CameraDeviceState: Legacy camera service transitioning to state CAPTURING
01-30 23:34:35.519 9490-9641/bazinac.aplikacenahouby D/tensorflow: CameraActivity: Initializing buffer 0 at size 228096
01-30 23:34:35.529 9490-9641/bazinac.aplikacenahouby D/tensorflow: CameraActivity: Initializing buffer 1 at size 114047
01-30 23:34:35.529 9490-9641/bazinac.aplikacenahouby D/tensorflow: CameraActivity: Initializing buffer 2 at size 114047
01-30 23:34:35.599 9490-9640/bazinac.aplikacenahouby D/INFERNECE: beforerunInference
01-30 23:34:38.359 9490-9640/bazinac.aplikacenahouby I/native: tensorflow_inference_jni.cc:228 End computing. Ran in 2765ms (2765ms avg over 1 runs)
01-30 23:34:38.359 9490-9640/bazinac.aplikacenahouby D/INFERNECE: afterrunInference
01-30 23:34:38.389 9490-9640/bazinac.aplikacenahouby D/INFERNECE: beforerunInference
01-30 23:34:40.779 9490-9640/bazinac.aplikacenahouby A/libc: Fatal signal 11 (SIGSEGV), code 1, fault addr 0x97028000 in tid 9640 (inference)

body:
Yeah but issue is that it is happening at .runInference call, on the second time when its called. I placed those log statements like this:

```
    Log.d("INFERNECE","before");
    inferenceInterface.runInference(outputNames);
    Log.d("INFERNECE","after");
```

and unfortunatelly there is not any further info regarding segfault, just

```
01-30 23:34:35.479 9490-9700/bazinac.aplikacenahouby I/CameraDeviceState: Legacy camera service transitioning to state CAPTURING
01-30 23:34:35.519 9490-9641/bazinac.aplikacenahouby D/tensorflow: CameraActivity: Initializing buffer 0 at size 228096
01-30 23:34:35.529 9490-9641/bazinac.aplikacenahouby D/tensorflow: CameraActivity: Initializing buffer 1 at size 114047
01-30 23:34:35.529 9490-9641/bazinac.aplikacenahouby D/tensorflow: CameraActivity: Initializing buffer 2 at size 114047
01-30 23:34:35.599 9490-9640/bazinac.aplikacenahouby D/INFERNECE: beforerunInference
01-30 23:34:38.359 9490-9640/bazinac.aplikacenahouby I/native: tensorflow_inference_jni.cc:228 End computing. Ran in 2765ms (2765ms avg over 1 runs)
01-30 23:34:38.359 9490-9640/bazinac.aplikacenahouby D/INFERNECE: afterrunInference
01-30 23:34:38.389 9490-9640/bazinac.aplikacenahouby D/INFERNECE: beforerunInference
01-30 23:34:40.779 9490-9640/bazinac.aplikacenahouby A/libc: Fatal signal 11 (SIGSEGV), code 1, fault addr 0x97028000 in tid 9640 (inference)
```
